title: Played 5 normal team builders today
body:
5 zeds on the other team.

Its good thing riot will release a new item for him too, he wasant being overplayed enough, why not throw him another buff while we are at it?Oh and remove the champ cap from blinds so we have 5 zeds vs 5 zeds every game while we jerk off the #LCSBIGPLAYS.
